docsharepoint.chat.server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • docsharepoint.chat.server.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    represents the decentralized server peers connect to this server to get a unique id and get a list of available peers on the network to communicate with.
    Author:
    George Karpouzas
